summary: An easy way of converting your own music to music files playable by skyrim (.XWM)
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Manual Music Replacer

A how to guide with converter and folder structure.

i thought i would simplify my \"How to replace skyrims music with your own\" to a simple click of a button.
its still in its early stages so don\'t expect to much of it

Readme:

This converter only accepts the .wav format, so you will most likely
have to convert your music files to .wav first.
here are some websites that can do this:
http://audio.online-convert.com/convert-to-wav
http://media.io/

after you converted your file to a .wav format you will have to rename it to any number from 1 to 9
1.wav 2.wav 3.wav etc........ (without the .wav in the name itself ofcourse)
you can convert up to 9 files at once with the appropriate namings from 1 to 9.
place the music files in this folder and click on the:
WAV to XWM converter
it will now convert the files to .xwm format.

SEE SECOND PICTURE FOR HOW IT SHOULD LOOK
author: Me
